text: He once heard a lion croak from a frog, and turned to where the sound came from, thinking it was from some very important animal. He waited and watched closely for a while, and when he saw the frog coming out of the swamp, he came up to her and crushed her, saying, "You little one who shouts so loudly! He who speaks much, says little.
title: La rana gritona y el león
author: nan Esopo
